title: VS Knight Lamune & 40 Fresh
synopsis: To save the galaxy from impending doom, Cacao and Parfait are sent on a mission through time and space to retrieve the Fourth Warrior, Lamunes.
staff: [['Fujimoto, Yoshitaka', ['Director']], ['Kaida, Yuriko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Hasegawa, Katsumi', ['Screenplay']], ['Kishimoto, Seiji', ['Mechanical Design']]]
